to.sven.androidrccar.client.logic.handler

Class FeatureMessageHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • to.sven.androidrccar.client.logic.handler.AbstractClientMessageHandler<FeatureMessage>
      • to.sven.androidrccar.client.logic.handler.FeatureMessageHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IMessageHandler<FeatureMessage>

    public class FeatureMessageHandler
extends AbstractClientMessageHandler<FeatureMessage>
    This handler handles a received FeatureMessage. This message is expected after sending the AuthenticationMessage if the authentication is successful.
    Author:
    sven

      • setUpCameraStream

        private void setUpCameraStream(FeatureMessage message)
        If supported and wanted by the client, the camera stream is set up. And if supported the IClientLogicListener will advised to enable rotation of the camera.
        Parameters:
        message - The features of the host.
